name: 蔡明誠
objective:
CALCULUS (I):
This course aims at developing comprehension of derivation and integral、activating capabilities of logic inference and induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content of Calculus(II)
includes: 6.Techniques of integration  7.Applications of integration  9.Parametric equations and polar coordinates 10.Vectors and the geometry of space 11.Partial derivatives 12.Multiple integrals
schedule:
Week 1-5 : Chapter 1 : Functions and Limits 
Week 4-8 : Chapter 2 : Derivatives
Week 9-12 : Chapter 3 : Inverse Functions 
Week 13-15 : Chapter 4 : Applications of Differentiation
Week 16-17  : Chapter 5 : Integrals
Week 18 : Final exam
scorePolicy:
In-class participation: 10%
Quizzes: 10%
Homework: 10%
Tests (not including Midterm and final exams): 20% (twice)
Midterm exam: 20%
Final exam: 30%
